carbon_offsetting_payer.label: Cost of carbon offsetting
carbon_offsetting_payer.help: Defines who of the customer/merchant is responsible for paying the carbon offset.
carbon_offsetting_payer.warning: WARNING: This field is currently disabled, so the merchant is responsible for paying the carbon compensation.

tree_api_server.label: PayGreen ClimateKit server
tree_api_server.help: Allows you to define which PayGreen ClimateKit server you want to use.
